name: Aqua Teen Hunger Force: Zombie Ninja Pro-Am
name_original: Aqua Teen Hunger Force: Zombie Ninja Pro-Am
description:
Aqua Teen Hunger Force: Zombie Ninja Pro-Am is an arcade game developed by Creat Studios. It came out on 05-11-2007. Midway published the game.
Aqua Teen Hunger Force: Zombie Ninja Pro-Am is available on PlayStation 2.
It was scored by Andrew Sega.
